name: Darshan Metal
overview:
Established in the year 1973, we, “Darshan Metal Industries Pvt. Ltd.”, are engaged in manufacturing, supplying and exporting a broad spectrum of Aluminium Packing Boxes and Trays.

Our Products : Our range of products encompasses Aluminium Loose Cover Box, Small Case with Hinge, Medium Case Bag With Hinge, Sliding Cover, Suitcase, Briefcase-Laptop Case and Aluminium Tray. Also, we offer Locker Box, Jewel Box With Cushion, Aluminium and Sheet Metal Products and Powder Coated Box.

Our Team” A competent team of professionals is recruited by us, which greatly supports in all our trade activities.

Our Quality”; Being a quality conscious organization, we strive to maintain high quality standards in our products & policies. The products offered by us are manufactured using excellent quality aluminum and plastic that are sourced from vendors of vendors of high repute after scouring the market.

Testing Facilities: JAYCO has its in-houe Design Department and the Tool-Room with skilled professionals to develop new products as per specific requirements of the customers. Our special characteristics include Qualified Management Personnel, and topmost priority given to customer satisfaction, quality and timely shipment.

Our Infrastructure: To execute the business operations in a streamlined manner, we have established a state-of-the-art infrastructure facility at our premises. Sprawling across a vast area, this facility is empowered with latest machines & equipment that enable us to utilize the resources in a judicious manner thus, making our range cost-effective.
